28/* Internal use only: Fake IPv6 structures and values on platforms that
29 * do not have them */
30
31#ifndef IPV6_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_
32#define IPV6_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_
33
34#include "event2/event-config.h"
35#include "evconfig-private.h"
36
37#include <sys/types.h>
38#ifdef EVENT__HAVE_SYS_SOCKET_H
39#include <sys/socket.h>
40#endif
41#include "event2/util.h"
42
43#ifdef __cplusplus
44extern "C" {
45#endif
46
47/** @file ipv6-internal.h
48 *
49 * Replacement types and functions for platforms that don't support ipv6
50 * properly.
51 */
52
53#ifndef EVENT__HAVE_STRUCT_IN6_ADDR
54struct in6_addr {
55 ev_uint8_t s6_addr[16];
56};
57#endif
58
59#ifndef EVENT__HAVE_SA_FAMILY_T
60typedef int sa_family_t;
61#endif
62
63#ifndef EVENT__HAVE_STRUCT_SOCKADDR_IN6
64struct sockaddr_in6 {
65 /* This will fail if we find a struct sockaddr that doesn't have
66 * sa_family as the first element. */
67 sa_family_t sin6_family;
68 ev_uint16_t sin6_port;
69 struct in6_addr sin6_addr;
70};
71#endif
72
73#ifndef AF_INET6
74#define AF_INET6 3333
75#endif
76#ifndef PF_INET6
77#define PF_INET6 AF_INET6
78#endif
79
80#ifdef __cplusplus
81}
82#endif
83
84#endif
85
